content:
Prodam 3 leta star prenosnik Dell Inspiron 6000 z naslednjimi karakteristikami:
- 6000 SHARED GRAPHICS: Pentium M 750 (1.86GHz 2MB L2 cache 533MHz FSB) & up to 128MB shared graphics memory
- 15.4 inch WSXGA+ LCD Panel
- European - Inspiron 6000 Power Cord
- 2048MB 533MHz DDR2 SDRAM Memory (2x1024MB)
- 60GB (7, 200rpm) IDE Hard Drive
- Fixed Internal 8X DVD+/-RW Drive with Software
- 65 Watt Netzteil
- Primary 80 Watt/Hour, 9 CELL Battery (Optional Upsell)
- Intel Media Accelerator 900 Graphics Up to 128MB shared system memory
- German - Modem Cable and Adapter
- EURO - Intel ProWireless 2200 802.11b/g Mini PCI Wireless LAN Card
- German - (QWERTZ) - Internal Keyboard
- Onboard Modem 56K V.92
Priključki:
- 4x USB, modem, mreža, 1x PCMCIA, SD card reader, audio in-audio out, firewire, COM port, Scart

Baterija drži med 30 minut in 1 uro, odvisno od uporabe. Prenosnik je še vedno v uporabi za vsakodnevno delo in dela popolnoma brez problema.

Cena: 250 EUR
author: mala_puncka

content:
Še vedno na voljo, nova cena 230.
Info na mail: mala.puncka@gmail.com
